name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Spring Leaves T-Shirt - Women's
categories: Merino Sport 150 Spring Leaves Graphic T-Shir
description: Leaf no trace when you enjoy the great outdoors. Smartwool quick-drying Sport 150 material wicks moisture away from your body and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Its natural odor resistance lets you extend the gap between laundry days.Jersey knit merino wool with a polyester core is durable and keeps wool next to your skin.Fine gauge merino wool.Rated at UPF 20+ to block 93% of harsh UV.Flatlock finishing and offset seams add comfort while wearing a pack.Regular fit.
